technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Urinary bladder is well-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Prostate is isoechoic; volume approximately 33.07 cc.
Left kidney shows mildly thickened, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Thyroid gland shows hypoechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Common bile duct measures 3.35 mm, within normal limits.
